General.Name: Inepar S.A. Indústria e Construções
General.Description: Inepar S.A. Indústria e Construções is in Reorganization. Inepar S.A. Indústria e Construções manufactures and supplies equipment and services for the generation, transmission, distribution, and consumption of electricity worldwide. The company is also involved in the exploration and processing of oil and gas; infrastructure for cargo handling; rail and subway transport; and implementation and expansion of infrastructure systems for telecommunications. Inepar S.A. Indústria e Construções was founded in 1953 and is based in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Alameda dos Jurupis, 455, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 04088-001
